text: Momchil Nekov () is a Bulgarian politician, who, since 2014, has been a Member of the European Parliament, representing Bulgaria. He is a member of the Bulgarian Socialist Party.http://www.europarl.europa.eu/meps/en/125013/MOMCHIL_NEKOV_home.html ==Parliamentary service== *Member, Committee on Culture and Education *Member, Delegation for relations with the People's Republic of China ==References== Category:Living people Category:1986 births Category:MEPs for Bulgaria 2014–2019 Category:People from Silistra Category:Bulgarian Socialist Party politicians
title: Momchil Nekov
